description:
On the first day of Golden Week, Koyomi Araragi, together with Tsubasa Hanekawa the class president, buries a tailless cat that was ran over by a car. An event that was supposedly petty and commonplace. However, the curtain rises on the “nine days of hell” that follow.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 総集篇I つばさファミリー
